description: Starts generating a report of the file metadata currently cached by an S3 File Gateway for a specific file share. You can use this report to identify and resolve issues if you have files failing upload from your gateway to Amazon S3. The report is a CSV file containing a list of files which match the set of filter parameters you specify in the request. The following requirements must be met to successfully generate a cache report:

parameters.name: FileShareARN
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the file share.

parameters.name: Role
parameters.description: The ARN of the IAM role used when saving the cache report to Amazon S3.

parameters.name: LocationARN
parameters.description: The ARN of the Amazon S3 bucket where you want to save the cache report.

parameters.name: BucketRegion
parameters.description: The Amazon Web Services Region of the Amazon S3 bucket where you want to save the cache report.

parameters.name: InclusionFilters
parameters.description: The list of filters and parameters that determine which files are included in the report. You must specify at least one value for InclusionFilters or ExclusionFilters in a StartCacheReport request. (dict) --- A list of filter parameters and associated values that determine which files are included or excluded from a cache report created by a StartCacheReport request. Multiple instances of the same filter parameter are combined with an OR operation, while different parameters are combined with an AND operation. The parameter name for a filter that determines which files are included or excluded from a cache report. UploadFailureReason | UploadState The parameter value for a filter that determines which files are included or excluded from a cache report. Valid UploadFailureReason Values: InaccessibleStorageClass | InvalidObjectState | ObjectMissing | S3AccessDenied Valid UploadState Values: FailingUpload (string) ---

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The parameter name for a filter that determines which files are included or excluded from a cache report. UploadFailureReason | UploadState.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: The parameter value for a filter that determines which files are included or excluded from a cache report. Valid UploadFailureReason Values: InaccessibleStorageClass | InvalidObjectState | ObjectMissing | S3AccessDenied Valid UploadState Values: FailingUpload.

parameters.name: ExclusionFilters
parameters.description: The list of filters and parameters that determine which files are excluded from the report. You must specify at least one value for InclusionFilters or ExclusionFilters in a StartCacheReport request. (dict) --- A list of filter parameters and associated values that determine which files are included or excluded from a cache report created by a StartCacheReport request. Multiple instances of the same filter parameter are combined with an OR operation, while different parameters are combined with an AND operation. The parameter name for a filter that determines which files are included or excluded from a cache report. UploadFailureReason | UploadState The parameter value for a filter that determines which files are included or excluded from a cache report. Valid UploadFailureReason Values: InaccessibleStorageClass | InvalidObjectState | ObjectMissing | S3AccessDenied Valid UploadState Values: FailingUpload (string) ---

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The parameter name for a filter that determines which files are included or excluded from a cache report. UploadFailureReason | UploadState.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: The parameter value for a filter that determines which files are included or excluded from a cache report. Valid UploadFailureReason Values: InaccessibleStorageClass | InvalidObjectState | ObjectMissing | S3AccessDenied Valid UploadState Values: FailingUpload.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: A unique identifier that you use to ensure idempotent report generation if you need to retry an unsuccessful StartCacheReport request. If you retry a request, use the same ClientToken you specified in the initial request.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: A list of up to 50 key/value tags that you can assign to the cache report. Using tags can help you categorize your reports and more easily locate them in search results. (dict) --- A key-value pair that helps you manage, filter, and search for your resource. Allowed characters: letters, white space, and numbers, representable in UTF-8, and the following characters: + - = . _ : /. Tag key. The key can't start with aws:. Value of the tag key.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: Tag key. The key can't start with aws:.

nested_items.name: CacheReportARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cache report generated by the StartCacheReport request.
